about_the_game:
You dare to enter my domain? Then prepare to ascend as the supreme Ritual Master under the watch of the Game Master, Shadow myself! Watch as the feeble-minded grovel before your arcane might. You shall weave spells of untold horror, summon the deads from the void, and erect defenses that defy the very laws of nature!

Key Elements of Your Reign:
• Ritual Deckbuilding: Hoard corrupted buildings and forbidden incantations as a dragon hoards gold. Craft a deck that reflects the depths of your depravity, raining chaos upon those foolish enough to oppose you.
• Duels Between Rituals of Nightmares: Raise towers surrounding your sacrifice that would make even the bravest hero weep, and summon abominations through blasphemous rituals to aid you in the duels between unholy sanctums. Position them with diabolical precision to crush waves of mewling heretics while bombarding their sacrifice with your unholy attacks.
• Death is But a Teacher: Fall and rise again stronger! Each defeat fuels your twisted evolution. Gather profane knowledge, unlock increasingly potent cards, construct vile edifices, and enhance your dark gifts.
• A World Bathed in Shadow: Immerse yourself in a realm where light fears to tread. Unearth the secrets of this accursed land, for knowledge is the key to ultimate dominion. Your rise to power unfolds through the sardonic narrative of mine, Shadow, accompanied by grotesque and mesmerizing illustrations that will sear themselves into your feeble mind!

Now, trembling mortal, do you dare seize this power? Will you crumble like so many before you, or will you rise as the one true Overlord of Shadows? Your reign of terror begins the moment you accept this diabolic challenge. The choice is yours… if you have the courage to make it!

short_description: Hear me, pitiful mortals, for I shall reveal to you the path to true power - a demonic fusion of deckbuilding, ritual duels, and roguelite! I speak of a realm shrouded in darkness, where only the most wicked may thrive. Behold my masterpiece, "Just A Shadow Game" .
